title: Trade Spotlight | What should investors do with Sterlite Tech, Schneider Electric, and United Breweries on... - Moneycontrol
content: Trade Spotlight | What should investors do with Sterlite Tech, Schneider Electric, and United Breweries on...  Moneycontrol
description: GE Shipping is well placed above its 20, 50, 100 and 200-day SMAs, which support bullish sentiments. The daily, weekly and monthly RSI continue to remain bullish as well, along with positive crossover, which supports sustained strength
